issues.title: Weekly Issue: Feb 9-14, 2026
issues.intro: A curated roundup of paid Print-and-Play projects shared by creators in the community this week.

projects.title: Red Dungeon
projects.summary: A standard-deck print-and-play dungeon crawler where players rebel against cursed-mine guards in a compact card-driven system.
projects.promoDetails: Campaign is live. Uses a standard deck of 52 cards.

projects.title: Fliegerkorps
projects.summary: A solo PnP wargame focused on air-corps command decisions with included sheets and card content for WWII-themed operations.
projects.promoDetails: Includes printable game sheets and card assets.

projects.title: KING
projects.summary: An advanced flip-and-write project aimed at players who enjoy deeper strategy and layered scoring puzzles.
projects.promoDetails: Project announced as coming soon in the weekly thread.

projects.title: Cat Saga
projects.summary: A co-op story-driven print-and-play adventure where group choices shape narrative outcomes across sessions.
projects.promoDetails: Promoted as a launch notification page for early supporters.
